title: About MyDub.AI
subtitle: We're building the most intelligent and comprehensive platform for Dubai, powered by AI to help residents and visitors discover, navigate, and enjoy everything this incredible city has to offer.
missionDescription: To make Dubai more accessible, discoverable, and enjoyable for everyone through intelligent technology that understands your needs and preferences.

aiAssistant.title: AI Assistant
aiAssistant.description: Our intelligent AI assistant learns from Dubai's vast array of options to provide personalized recommendations for dining, entertainment, tourism, and services.

realTimeInfo.title: Real-Time Information
realTimeInfo.description: Stay updated with the latest news, government announcements, events, and changes that affect life in Dubai.

multiLanguage.title: Arabic Learning & Multi-Language
multiLanguage.description: Learn Arabic with our daily phrase feature showcasing 285+ essential phrases, plus full support for English, Arabic, Hindi, and Urdu with RTL text support.

government.title: Government Integration
government.description: Simplify your interactions with Dubai government services through easy access to official information and procedures.

userCentric.title: User-Centric
userCentric.description: Everything we build is designed with our users in mind, providing value and solving real problems.

innovation.title: Innovation
innovation.description: We leverage cutting-edge AI technology to create intelligent, helpful experiences.

trustPrivacy.title: Trust & Privacy
trustPrivacy.description: Your data privacy and security are our top priorities in everything we do.

accessibility.title: Accessibility
accessibility.description: We believe information should be accessible to everyone, in their preferred language.

teamDescription: We're a passionate team of technologists, designers, and Dubai experts working together to create the best possible experience for our users.

aiTeam.name: AI Technology Team
aiTeam.description: Building intelligent systems that understand and serve Dubai better every day.

contentTeam.name: Content Team
contentTeam.description: Ensuring our information is accurate, relevant, and reflects the true spirit of Dubai.

designTeam.name: Design Team
designTeam.description: Creating beautiful, intuitive experiences that work seamlessly across all devices.

joinUsDescription: We're always looking for talented individuals who share our passion for making Dubai more accessible through technology.
